description: The cover image features a beautifully decorated winter scene, showcasing various winter decoration elements such as wreaths, garlands, and festive ornaments. The background includes soft falling snowflakes with a serene blue color palette to evoke a wintery atmosphere. Prominently displayed in the foreground are images of the workshop speakers: Miranda Yates, Sam Knightly, Zachary Evans, and Veronica Floyd, each engaging in their craft, surrounded by materials relevant to winter decorations.

captions.background: The background is a winter landscape with faint snowflakes falling, creating a calm and festive ambiance for the workshop theme.
captions.objects: The objects include images of the four speakers engaged in winter decoration activities, like crafting wreaths and arranging ornaments. Text overlays introduce their names and titles.

heading: Winter Decoration Workshop
Join Us for Festive Fun!
sub_heading: Miranda Yates, Sam Knightly, Zachary Evans, Veronica Floyd
